title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 54.3 - Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 54.3 - Requirements

State Regulations

It shall be unlawful for any person to operate or ride
upon a motorcycle unless he or she wears a protective helmet of the type which
meets the requirements set forth in Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standards of
49 Code of Federal Regulations standard 571.218 Motorcycle

Helmets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
54.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
